JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description     Participate in planning and execution activities within a development team   Analyze and influence business, functional and technical requirements   Engaging with team in software requirement analysis, design and reviews   Staying current with modern web development trends   Develop code according to specifications and standards   Prepare test data   Present ideas and solutions   Plan and conduct basic unit, integration testing, performance testing   Engage in continuous learning and adoption of new concepts, technology and functionality   Positions at this level are responsible for planning, processing, and executing technical assignments.   Makes independent decisions and gets it reviewed before taking action within established practices and procedures.   Work is collaborative in nature and provides regular updates to scrum team on project/assignments status.   Impacts team or client productivity/effectiveness.   Interact with employees and/or clients for specialized or informative purposes.
